A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Special effects were top notch. Mark Hamill did his best to play what was given to him but his character falls flat. The movie is a dud a lame lame sequel and should have never seen the light of day. I lost faith of disney ever making a good star wars again. Roque was alright and was waiting to see what was next. This was just so disappointing it's such a let down .I won't say it ruined my childhood because as far as I'm concerned only episodes 1-6 count as star wars and the clone wars cartoon and maybe rebels. This iust a slow chase scene in space dragged out for 2 hours!!! They could have cut down the chase scene to 10 minutes. There was nothing redeemable about the storyline. Carrie Fisher is gone and her role was such a let down  though I don't blame any of the actors. The failure is solely on kathleen and Rain Johnson who made this turd of a starwars movie. Would rather see the christmas special over this pile of dung.
